panels.visual: Visual: STARWIND THE PEGASUS - magnificent but suffering. Dark shadow chains wrap around her legs, pinning her to the dead ground. Her wings hang limp and GRAY instead of white. THREE SHADOWS circle her like sharks, reaching with grasping hands, draining her life. At the base of the largest dead tree, a DARK CRYSTAL pulses with sickly purple light. Location: Cursed Grove Characters: Starwind (chained), Shadows (3)
panels.dialogue: (Caption): "Trial Four: The Cursed Grove" Starwind: *a pleading whinny that breaks the heart*
